subject: Soccer
Women's World Cup (Soccer)
organizations: United States Women's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: During the past nine months, the United States players have navigated a coaching change, a failed lawsuit over the use of artificial turf at the World Cup, and troublesome injuries to key players.
snippet: During the past nine months, the United States players have navigated a coaching change, a failed lawsuit over the use of artificial turf at the World Cup, and troublesome injuries to key players.
